name: BDSMSDB
description:
A digital, card-based role-playing game in which two people are invited to explore submission and domination, within the strict but mutually comfortable bounds of consent. You will do so for activities which are intimate and sensual, but not overtly erotic.

The game can be played with a handful of relatively straightforward, consent-limited props, including: a feather, blindfold/eyemask, earplugs/noise-cancelling earphones and soft rope or scarves with which to bind the ankles and/or wrists.

Made at Lyst Summit 2017 by:

  • Your boy, Sugar : Development and whips
  • Simon Stålhandske : Development and bananas
  • Gemma Thomson : Action design and expertise
  • Tyu : Visual style and idea provider
